attributes.action: Bring back the head teacher Mr Martin of Adeyfield school.
attributes.background: Mr Martin been head teacher at Adeyfield school in hemel hempstead for years.He loves the school,very supportive of students and parents.He is a example Haed Teacher.The school will be lost without him.the students really like him.we students and parents want him back

rejection.details:
We don't allow petitions about appointments.  
 
In any case, the UK Parliament and Government are not responsible for deciding who the head teacher of Adeyfield school should be.
